name: Space Shooter 9000 (Persomatey)
description:
A side scrolling space shooter game made by College of the Canyons Computer Science Club over the Fall 2017 semester. (Re-Uploaded to my itch.io account as I've made adjustments and bug fixes after graduation and my departure from the club). 

A side-scrolling space shooter arcade game with a low poly aesthetic. Battle through wave after wave of enemy ships as you plunge deep into enemy territory.
